first.question: Do you sort waste or do you only use one trash can to put all your waste in?
answers: You are only using one trash can

kysely.question: Waste sorting would be important for the environment.
answers: In addition to mixed waste, you are considering using other bins where you could collect, for example, bio or plastic waste
You get it easier when you don't sort waste and use only one trash can

toinen.question: The trash can you put mixed waste in is starting to fill up.
answers: You take the bag containing the rubbish out of the trashcan, close it and prepare to take it to the outside waste bin
You take the bag containing the rubbish out of the trashcan, close it and leave it in the hallway

toinenUusi.question: The garbage bag starts to stink in the hallway.
answers: To keep the smell from bothering you, you use clothespin to close your nostrils and wait for someone else to take your rubbish
You are preparing to take the garbage bag to the outside waste bin

viimMahdollisuus.question: Several days have passed and no one has taken the garbage bag in the hallway.
answers: You still don’t take the garbage bag anywhere, but from now on you live with a clothespin in your nose
You are preparing to take the garbage bag to the outside waste bin

ulkona.question: You are in a trash shed and you have in your hand a trash bag that you have collected mixed waste. In which waste bin do you put it?

takaisinAsunnossa.question: After throwing the garbage bag in the trash, you will return to your apartment.
answers: You put a new empty bag in the trashcan
You do not put a new bag in the trashcan
